name: The Secrets of Gradia
description:
The Secrets of Gradia is a VR climbing exploration game I created for the final major project of my masters degree at UAL. I wanted to explore climbing as a mechanic, and decided to have players climb a mountain to explore mysterious ruins.

The project taught me a lot about developing in VR and level design iteration. I spent a lot of time ironing out repetitive motions and create segments that were both challenging but not exhausting the player.

This project is envisioned as part of a wider gameplay experience, and I will be returning to it when I have levelled up my skills a bit so that I can achieve my original vision!
